{"id":1507562976,"question_id":3522,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"3 weeks, 3 days","timestamp":1736792779,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1507562976/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Power of K-Size Subarrays I","memory":"34.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<int> resultsArray(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        //Return an integer array results of size n - k + 1, where results[i] is the power of nums[i..(i + k - 1)].\n        if(k==1)\n            return nums;\n        int n = nums.size();\n        vector<int> results(n-k+1, -1);\n        int consecutiveCount = 1;\n        for(int right = 0; right<n-1; right++) {\n            if(nums[right]+1 == nums[right+1])\n                consecutiveCount++;\n            else\n                consecutiveCount = 1;\n            if(consecutiveCount>=k) {\n                results[right-k+2] = nums[right+1];\n            }\n        }\n        return results;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-power-of-k-size-subarrays-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
